logo.description: A visually appealing logo featuring a tire and wrench, symbolizing automotive care and expertise.

sections.title: Welcome to PitStop Auto Care
sections.subtitle: Your trusted partner in automotive excellence
sections.name: hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content: At PitStop Auto Care, we pride ourselves on delivering top-notch automotive repair and maintenance services. Our expert technicians are committed to keeping your vehicle running smoothly and safely.

images.name: Auto Service Banner
images.description: A high-quality image of a mechanic working on a car, representing expert service.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Your Vehicle is Our Priority
sections.name: about
sections.label: About Us
sections.content: Founded over a decade ago, PitStop Auto Care is a family-owned business dedicated to providing exceptional service and customer satisfaction. Our ASE-certified mechanics use the latest technology and techniques to ensure your car receives the best possible care. We believe in honest work, transparency, and building long-term relationships with our clients.

images.name: Shop Interior
images.description: An inviting image of the shop interior, showcasing cleanliness and modern equipment.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Comprehensive Automotive Solutions
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Engine Diagnostics & Repair**  
- **Brake Services**  
- **Oil Changes**  
- **Tire Services**  
- **Transmission Repair**  
- **Air Conditioning Services**  
- **Battery Replacement**  
We offer a full spectrum of services to meet all your automotive needs, ensuring optimal performance and safety of your vehicle.

images.name: Service Example
images.description: Mechanics working on a vehicle, representing the hands-on expertise offered at PitStop.

sections.title: Happy Customers
sections.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
sections.name: testimonials
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
Our clients have trusted us time and again to keep their vehicles in perfect running condition. Here’s what they’ve shared about their experience with us:  

- *"PitStop Auto Care provided exceptional service at an unbeatable price. Highly recommended!" - Jane D.*  
- *"Professional, friendly, and efficient. I wouldn't trust my car with anyone else!" - Tom K.*

images.name: Customer Feedback
images.description: A smiling customer shaking hands with a mechanic, signifying satisfaction.

sections.title: Get in Touch
sections.subtitle: We’re Here to Help
sections.name: contact
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Have a question or need to schedule service? Contact us today!  
- **Phone**: (555) 123-4567  
- **Email**: support@pitstopautocare.com  
- **Address**: 456 Car Lane, Mechanicsville  
Visit our shop for in-person assistance or fill out our [contact form](#) on the website to get started. We look forward to serving you!
